name: Tata Trust Merit Scholarship
description: Private scholarship from Tata Trusts for meritorious students from low-income families pursuing undergraduate education in engineering, medicine, or science fields.
benefits: Up to Rs. 50,000 per year covering tuition fees and books, plus mentorship support from Tata professionals.
applicationSteps: Visit the Tata Trusts scholarship portal
Create an account and verify email
Fill in personal, academic, and financial details
Upload required documents including income certificate

name: Infosys Foundation Scholarship for Women in STEM
description: Scholarship by Infosys Foundation to encourage women students pursuing STEM education at undergraduate and postgraduate levels in recognized institutions.
benefits: Rs. 75,000 per year for up to 4 years, internship opportunities at Infosys, and access to mentorship programs.
applicationSteps: Upload academic transcripts and recommendation letters
Write a 500-word essay on 'Why STEM matters'

name: Reliance Foundation Rural Scholarship
description: Scholarship program by Reliance Foundation for students from rural areas pursuing higher education in any field, aimed at bridging the urban-rural education gap.
benefits: Rs. 60,000 per year for tuition and hostel expenses, plus laptop support for first-year students.
applicationSteps: Register on Reliance Foundation Scholarships portal
Fill in personal and academic information

name: HDFC Bank Educational Development Fund
description: Scholarship by HDFC Bank for economically disadvantaged students pursuing professional courses in engineering, medicine, law, and management.
benefits: Full tuition fee coverage up to Rs. 1,00,000 per year and monthly stipend of Rs. 2,000 for living expenses.
applicationSteps: Register with valid email and phone number
Fill scholarship application with all details

name: Azim Premji Foundation Scholarship for Teachers
description: Scholarship for students pursuing B.Ed or M.Ed who wish to become teachers in government schools, especially in rural and underserved areas.
benefits: Rs. 40,000 per year for course duration, placement support in Azim Premji Foundation schools, and professional development workshops.
applicationSteps: Download and fill the application form
Write a statement of purpose (1000 words)

name: Kotak Kanya Scholarship
description: Scholarship by Kotak Mahindra Group for meritorious girl students from underprivileged families pursuing professional graduation courses.
benefits: Rs. 1,50,000 per year (up to Rs. 1.5 lakh) for entire course duration (max 4 years) directly to institution.
applicationSteps: Upload Class 12 marksheet and income proof
